ValidationRule.description: Used in the PW Registration Form
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Sole Proprietorship", Registration__r.Record_Type_Name__c = "Public_Works", LEN(SSN__c) = 0, LEN( ITIN__c) = 0 ) || AND( RecordType.Name = "Sole Proprietorship", Registration__r.Record_Type_Name__c = "Public_Works", LEN( SSN__c ) <> 9, LEN(ITIN__c) <>9) || AND( RecordType.Name = "Sole Proprietorship", Registration__r.Record_Type_Name__c = "Public_Works", NOT(ISNUMBER( SSN__c )), LEN(SSN__c) <>0) || AND( RecordType.Name = "Sole Proprietorship", Registration__r.Record_Type_Name__c = "Public_Works", NOT(ISNUMBER( ITIN__c )), LEN(ITIN__c ) <> 0 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An SSN or ITIN is required. It must only contain 9 alphanumeric characters.
